body:
Very, very, very belated followup on this: I'm tying up loose ends in
my thesis, and this is the last paper I want to cite I haven't actually
seen. The history is thus:

I wrote:

Greg replied:

Then Steven Selkowitz:

I did follow up with LBL's archivists, and they couldn't find it.

Did it by any chance turn up?

Randolph
subject: [Radiance-general] Re: Grynberg's validation report?
